p: A study in Spain found that a high proportion of women who use drugs suffer psychological or physical violence by partners. Results from the study show that 88% of women who use drugs reported having ever suffered emotional or psychological damage, 71% indicated having experienced at least one incident of serious physical injury by a male partner and 49% having ever suffered sexual abuse. Similar to other studies, results show the syndemic of substance abuse, partners violence, HIV, mental illness and social instability [ 54]. In comparison with men, women who use drugs have considerably more frequent and intense experiences with interpersonal violence, sexual abuse and trauma.
